page.title: 17ISLINGTON GREEN YOUTH CENTRE
page.content: The youth centre is a room in slington Green School,where teenagers and the young unemployed can relax and enjoy themselves.The youth centre has such activities as drama,aerobics,judo, and table tennis.It also runs activiy programmes for the unemployed such as driving lessons and discos.At lunch times it is used by pupils who attend Islington Green for example mondays 5th years,Tuesdays 4th years etc.If you attend the youth centre at night the membership fee (per annum) is 130p for under 18's and UB40 holders.For over 8's the fee is 400p or 60p per hour per term depending on where you live.At night it is open from 6:30 until 9:30pm Mondays to Fridays during school term. Islington Green Youth Centre does more than keep young people off the streets It tries to teach them about themselves
